Chicken Bok bok Bok bok Bok bok

Japan is a very reserved society. Very conservative. You could offend someone in Japan and never realize it because they don't want to cause a scene. -- A common theme in netorare is turning a woman into a slave to lust. Making women, against their will initially, break family/marriage/relationship/social bonds/rules because they are conquered by a man's cock. Possibly a very appealing naughty power fantasy to a nation of salarymen feeling oppressed, overworked, and underappreciated. Even if the "alpha" isn't Japanese. That might actually add to the escapism. -- Of course the naughty power fantasy adds requirements too. Things like rape/blackmail which tend to be overused. Making the stories more predictable and boring.

@SirRobin Going by the doujins being uploaded, I'd say Japan has fallen for the BBC meme. Even I enjoy some NTR from time to time but if it ends up becoming mainstream in Japan, they'll have a problem on their hands. Depending on your mindset it could be destructive for your psyche.

Also I find it hilarious how you're always in these comment sections. Hope you can overcome that quasi-NTR experience you mentioned somewhere else. But, if I have to give my opinion, I think you're letting it consume you. For starters, maybe you should practice on self-inserting as the cucker instead of the cucked. It might be the first step to overcoming your complex.

@torpeter -- Well it seems netorare has become as mainstream as vanilla in japan. So maybe more is being produced? Maybe its a cultural thing with japan that makes netorare more popular? -- Also it could be a favorite fetish of the uploader/translator too. Naturally they'll post more of whatever they like. No matter how bland or boring it is for others. -- Also uploading, reuploading, re-re-uploading, and then uploading the colorized versions can make it seem more popular too.
